metadata.title: Embrace the Lamplight of Ambition, Part 1

tracks.text: Red light rolls right over humans. Green light rolls left over avatars. Rakuro and Sunraku, Towa and Pencilgon, Kei and Katzo, Rei and Psyger-0.
A green sword-shaped tower stands behind a fountain in the middle of Eleventar. Day turns to night. Red text, Shangri-La Frontier.
Sunraku stands in the Inventoria
Pencilgon and Katzo stand back to back in the ruins.
A mail bird lands on Psyger-0's arm.
Akane, Creecrue, and Emul run at night through the barrens under a crescent moon.
Ether Reactor, Operations Unit, Golden Crystal sphere, Idols
Professor in library
Psyger-100 in Eleventar
Emul runs from SF Zoo
Bilac hammers in a forge. Amariys sips coffee. In Nephilim Hollow, Rust and Mold stand on a roof near satellite dishes.
A computer sits in the Utopia reference room.
Sunraku flies through the crystal nest fighting scorpions.
Sunraku flies through the Ruins, fighting golems.
In Nephilim Hollow, Sunraku stares up. He dissapears. Kingfisher and Crimson Twinewing fly around and fight. In the red mecha, Rust screams.
A spiky golem in the ruins.
The Gatekeeper's arms glow blue.
The Golden Crystal scorpion spreads its pincers.
Akitsu Akane, a blue haired ninja girl, makes hand signals.
Sunraku stares up at the Overdress Golem
Pencilgon swings a golden spear.
Katzo red fist punches the Gatekeeper.
Psyger-0 holds a sword and takes her dark form.
Sunraku wears his helm and Gilta Bar
Clouds cover the moon.
A shadowy wolf lunges from the darkness.
Text 36, Embrace the Lamplight of Ambition, part 1
An ominous, black and purple aura gather across black fur.
Sunraku and Psyger-0 look up.
Clouds drift away from the crescent moon.
Light rolls across broken metal covered in moss.
SF Zoo stands on a platform
Lycagon sits on a platform high above them.
Lycagon adjusts a paw, knocking a rock. It falls.
5 knights in heavy armor and shields run forward.
9 sorcerers follow
Rei stares
Lycagon leaps down from her perch
She watches with orange eyes. she bares sharp fangs.
The Zoo knights places their heavy, rectangular shields together, forming a wall.
They stare
Lycagon growls
Shadows drift from her fur like smoke. SF Zoo quakes
Animalia grits her teeth
The knight slams his shields together. Lycagon lunges.
She slaps him with a paw, and he goes flying into nearby rubble.
HP 71 of 560
The sorcerors hold out matching staffs. They conjure glowing triangles, which fly towards Lycagon.
The triangles wrap abound her legs and tie her to the ground.
She shakes and roars, then bites at the glowing binds.
She breaks one.
They shoot more triangles at her.
The binds wrap around her neck and tail
She struggles on the ground.
A sorcerer shoots a stream of light at her neck.
Animalia walks forward, swtiching out a bone dream catcher staff for a creepy bone hand staff.
A pair of red magic circles form around Lycagon
2 rotting flesh arms reach up from the circles and grab Lycagon
They grab her head and drag her to the ground. She glares at Animalia.
Purple lightnight crackles around her eyes
Shadows ooze from Lycagon
Clouds cross over the moon.
The wind blows, blowing Animalia's hair and hood. She grins widely as she steps forward.
Darkness oozes around Lycagon and rises
Sunraku follows the darkness up
Purple shimmers over a web of darkness covering the sky
Animalia looks up
She stares into an endless empty void. Orange eyes open.
A torrent of crackling shadow crashes on top of Animalia.
Animalia's torso dangles from Lycagon's mouth.
SF Zoo stares. A knight falls to his knees.
Animalia chases, restrains, and pets a frightened bear, deer, chipmunk, chicken, and moose.
Lycagon tosses Animalia in the air, bleeding, then catches her in her mouth.
Animalia disappears.
Lycagon dissipates into shadow
A dark puddle forms in a shadow behind a sorceror
The shadow clone stomps a sorceror
The shadow clone emerges from another shadow and stomps 2 more.
He remembers losing legs
Clouds part from the moon.
The rotten hands holding down Lycagon disspell
She stands and shakes her whole body.
She flicks her tail and looks down at the Zoo members
One sorceror remains. She crawls.
Lycagon steps on her.
Chains wrap around him
Rei walks under an umbrella
Rakuro runs past
She stares through a store window.
He takes a game from Mana and jumps, smiling.
Rain bounces off her umbrella. Rakuro leaves Rock Roll and runs off, game in hand. Rei watches.
His face brightens
He stares forward
The chains holding him back begin to crack.
He pulls against the chains, breaking them
Lycagon swings a paw and hits the ground, sending a crack across the earth.
Dialog, you've received a party request from Sunraku. Accept?
She clicks yes
Sunraku and Psyger-0 stare forward
Sunraku equips marsh daggers. Light gleams across their green edges.
Rei lifts her giant, purple long sword.
Lycagon and the players charge.
The moon shines as the clouds part.
